OOC: How does Radistor plan on getting to Maximal City? its in 
Africa. The Chvtron base is taking place in North America. He would 
have to pass by a bunch of hostile bases to get there I believe that 
are in the ocean or on an island heh.

As Radistor moves away Gemini Dragon once again takes flight and 
opens fire on one tire with a blast of flam as he unleashes a blast 
of liquid nitrogen at Radistors back.
--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Kick connects? I don't like that.
> 
> Radistor DUCKS the kick, anticipating it fully. The tiny weapon 
fire doesn't do anything to slow him down as he turns towards the 
Maximal base's direction...
> 
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 11:09 PM
>   Subject: Re: Clash
> 
> 
>   Gemini Dragon seemed unaffected by Radistors plea and soon took 
off 
>   and sped past him cutting off his escape. HE then slammed a foot 
into 
>   Radistors neck hopefully knocking him back.
> 
>   Gemini Dragon: "We are here to make sure the future is not 
altered. 
>   You guys will cause damage to the timeline already and Deemos 
will 
>   die if he persists in attacking on this world and in the past."
>

that

for

out

from
